languages.text: {n}Эльдарское устройство подрагивает, и гололит-проекция мира с несколькими отмеченными координатами возникает в его руке.{/n} "Я поделюсь собранной информацией, ибо надеюсь, что даже мастер плоти не сможет ускользнуть сразу от двух преследователей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдарское устройство подрагивает, и голопроекция мира с несколькими отмеченными координатами возникает в его руке.{/n} "Я поделюсь собранной информацией, ибо надеюсь, что даже мастер плоти не сможет ускользнуть сразу от двух преследователей".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Aeldari device thrums and a holographic projection of the world with several marked coordinates appears in his palm.{/n} "I will share the information I have gathered, for I hope that even a master of flesh will not be able to elude two pursuers at once."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарское устройство подрагивает, и гололит-проекция мира с несколькими отмеченными координатами возникает в его руке.{/n} "Я поделюсь собранной информацией, ибо надеюсь, что даже мастер плоти не сможет ускользнуть сразу от двух преследователей".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari device thrums and a holographic projection of the world with several marked coordinates appears in his palm.{/n} "I will share the information I have gathered, for I hope that even a master of flesh will not be able to elude two pursuers at once."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}El dispositivo Aeldari vibra en la palma de su mano y proyecta un holograma del planeta con diversas coordenadas señaladas.{/n} «Compartiré contigo la información que he recabado, con la esperanza de que ni siquiera un maestro de la carne pueda eludir a dos perseguidores».
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari device thrums and a holographic projection of the world with several marked coordinates appears in his palm.{/n} "I will share the information I have gathered, for I hope that even a master of flesh will not be able to elude two pursuers at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}El dispositivo Aeldari vibra en la palma de su mano y proyecta un holograma del planeta con diversas coordenadas señaladas.{/n} «Compartiré contigo la información que he recabado, con la esperanza de que ni siquiera un maestro de la carne pueda eludir a dos perseguidores».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}艾达灵族的装置发出了响声，随后，他的掌中出现了一个全息投影，显示了这个世界中的几处坐标。{/n}“我愿意分享我掌握的线索。我想，即使是血肉大师，也无法同时躲避两位猎手。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari device thrums and a holographic projection of the world with several marked coordinates appears in his palm.{/n} "I will share the information I have gathered, for I hope that even a master of flesh will not be able to elude two pursuers at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾达灵族的装置发出了响声，随后，他的掌中出现了一个全息投影，显示了这个世界中的几处坐标。{/n}“我愿意分享我掌握的线索。我想，即使是血肉之主，也无法同时躲避两位猎手。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'appareil de l'Aeldari se met à vrombir et une projection holographique du monde apparaît dans la paume de sa main, affichant plusieurs coordonnées.{/n} « Je voudrais partager nos renseignements avec vous, dans l'espoir que ce maître de la chair ne pourra pas échapper à deux poursuivants à la fois. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari device thrums and a holographic projection of the world with several marked coordinates appears in his palm.{/n} "I will share the information I have gathered, for I hope that even a master of flesh will not be able to elude two pursuers at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'appareil de l'Aeldari se met à vrombir et une projection holographique du monde apparaît dans la paume de sa main, affichant plusieurs coordonnées.{/n} « Je voudrais partager nos renseignements avec vous, dans l'espoir que ce maître de la chair ne pourra pas échapper à deux poursuivants à la fois. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}アエルダリの装置が鳴り響き、彼の手のひらに座標を示すホログラムが映し出される。{/n}「私が集めた情報を共有しよう。屍肉の主といえども、一度に二人の追っ手から逃れることはできないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari device thrums and a holographic projection of the world with several marked coordinates appears in his palm.{/n} "I will share the information I have gathered, for I hope that even a master of flesh will not be able to elude two pursuers at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリの装置が鳴り響き、彼の手のひらに座標を示すホログラムが映し出される。{/n}「私が集めた情報を共有しよう。屍肉の主といえども、一度に二人の追っ手から逃れることはできないだろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das Aeldari-Gerät brummt, und eine holografische Projektion der Welt erscheint in seiner Handfläche. Mehrere Koordinaten sind darauf markiert.{/n} "Ich teile die Informationen, die ich gesammelt habe, denn ich hoffe, dass selbst ein Meister des Fleisches keinen zwei Verfolgern gleichzeitig entkommen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari device thrums and a holographic projection of the world with several marked coordinates appears in his palm.{/n} "I will share the information I have gathered, for I hope that even a master of flesh will not be able to elude two pursuers at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Aeldari-Gerät brummt, und eine holografische Projektion der Welt erscheint in seiner Handfläche. Mehrere Koordinaten sind darauf markiert.{/n} "Ich teile die Informationen, die ich gesammelt habe, denn ich hoffe, dass selbst ein Meister des Fleisches keinen zwei Verfolgern gleichzeitig entkommen kann."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Aeldari'nin cihazı vızıldıyor, avucunda birden çok koordinatın işaretlendiği holografik bir dünya projeksiyonu beliriyor.{/n} "Topladığım bilgileri paylaşacağım. Zira bir et üstadının bile aynı anda iki avcıdan kaçamayacağını umuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari device thrums and a holographic projection of the world with several marked coordinates appears in his palm.{/n} "I will share the information I have gathered, for I hope that even a master of flesh will not be able to elude two pursuers at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari'nin cihazı vızıldıyor ve avucunda birden çok koordinatın işaretlendiği holografik bir dünya projeksiyonu beliriyor.{/n} "Topladığım bilgileri paylaşacağım. Zira bir et üstadının bile aynı anda iki avcıdan kaçamayacağını umuyorum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
